profileAlternative.name: Simon Gottesman
profileAlternative.headline: PHP and Javascript Developer
profileAlternative.summary:
PHP and Javascript web developer, with several years experience working on numerous projects.

Specialties: Web development with several MVC frameworks, including Zend and Cake, as well as with Javascript frameworks such as AngularJS, Handlebars, and JQuery Mobile/Phonegap app development.

aboutAlternative.text:
PHP and Javascript web developer, with several years experience working on numerous projects.

Specialties: Web development with several MVC frameworks, including Zend and Cake, as well as with Javascript frameworks such as AngularJS, Handlebars, and JQuery Mobile/Phonegap app development.

positions.title: Lead PHP and Javascript Developer
positions.description: Building new websites and enhancing with major features several large Fortune 500 client websites utilizing PHP, Javascript and a proprietary, in-house CMS.

positions.title: Web Developer
positions.description: PHP web developer working on promotional contest websites affiliated with Fortune 500 clients, including General Mills, Warner Bros., RealD, Marvel Comics, and many others. Projects all included extensive front-end coding as well, including CSS for web page styling and Javascript for interactive sites.

positions.title: Software and web developer
positions.description: I have worked as the chief software engineer at UnitedPhysicians LLC, a company in development focused on providing a novel approach in healthcare. I have worked with numerous technologies in this position, including PHP, the Zend Framework, SQL Server, Ajax, and JQuery.

positions.title: Helpdesk Software Technician
positions.description: Performed technical support and maintenance for all versions of Microsoft Windows and various applications, such as M.S. Office, Test Out, and CUNY-specific applications
